original_text: Girded with girdles upon their loins, exceeding in dyed attire upon their heads, all of them princes to look to, after the manner of the Babylonians of Chaldea, the land of their nativity:
korean_text: 그 형상은 허리를 띠로 동이고 머리를 긴 수건으로 쌌으며 그의 용모는 다 준수한 자 곧 그의 고향 갈대아 바벨론 사람 같은 것이라

sentences.original_text: Girded with girdles upon their loins
exceeding in dyed attire upon their heads
all of them princes to look to
after the manner of the Babylonians
of Chaldea, the land of their nativity
